name: Photon (Nerisma)
description:
Photon is a fun, fast paced, beautiful arcade game in which you control a photon going trough a wavy tunnel.  

Collect light particules along the way to get a higher score and a bit extra speed. The further you go, the more point you score ! The photon naturally goes down, so you have to adjust its trajectory along the way to avoid collision with the tunnel.

Global leaderboard in game.

THIS GAME HAS BEEN MADE IN 5 DAYS (with Unity).

Controls

- Touch the screen to go up. The longer the touch, the higher you go

Credits

- Menu music: Kevin MacLeod 

- Ingame music: Alexander Nakaradah
